scripts.test:unit: dojo build --mode unit && dojo test --unit --config local
scripts.test:functional: dojo build --mode functional && dojo test --functional --config local
scripts.test:all: dojo build --mode unit && dojo build --mode functional && dojo test --all --config local
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir dist
scripts.build:lib: dojo build widget --mode dist --target lib && shx cp -r output/dist/* dist/
scripts.build:lib:legacy: dojo build widget --mode dist --target lib -l && shx cp -r output/dist/* dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:lib:legacy && shx cp package.json dist/ && shx cp README.md dist/
